languages.text: {n}На одно мгновение маска самоуверенности на лице Маражая дрогает — в движении брови и изменившемся взгляде вы улавливаете... сомнение? Впрочем, ксенос сразу же театрально вздыхает и отворачивается.{/n} "Довольно болтовни".

{n}For a brief moment, the mask of self-confidence on Marazhai's face slips. The twitch of his eyebrows and his altered expression almost betray his... doubt? The xenos, however, quickly turns away with an affected sigh.{/n} "Enough talk."
languages.original_text: {n}На одно мгновение маска самоуверенности на лице Маражая дрогает — в движении брови и изменившемся взгляде вы улавливаете... сомнение? Впрочем, ксенос сразу же театрально вздыхает и отворачивается.{/n} "Довольно болтовни".

traits.locale_text: {n}For a brief moment the mask of self-confidence on Marazhai's face fractures. The movement of the eyebrows and the changed look almost betray his... doubt? The xenos, however, quickly turns away with a theatrical sigh.{/n} "Enough talk."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

traits.locale_text: {n}For a brief moment the mask of self-confidence on Marazhai's face fractures. The movement of the eyebrows and the changed look almost betray his... doubt? The xenos, however, quickly turns away with a theatrical sigh.{/n} "Enough talk."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

traits.locale_text: {n}For a brief moment, the mask of self-confidence on Marazhai's face slips up. The twitch of the eyebrows and the changed look almost betray his... doubt maybe? The xenos, however, quickly turns away with a dramatic sigh.{/n} "Enough talk."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

traits.locale_text: {n}For a brief moment, the mask of self-confidence on Marazhai's face slips up. The twitch of the eyebrows and the changed look almost betray his... doubt maybe? The xenos, however, quickly turns away with a dramatic sigh.{/n} "Enough talk."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

traits.locale_text: {n}For a brief moment, the mask of self-confidence on Marazhai's face slips. The twitch of his eyebrows and his altered expression almost betray his... doubt? The xenos, however, quickly turns away with an affected sigh.{/n} "Enough talk."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

traits.locale_text: {n}For a brief moment, the mask of self-confidence on Marazhai's face slips. The twitch of his eyebrows and his altered expression almost betray his... doubt? The xenos, however, quickly turns away with an affected sigh.{/n} "Enough talk."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}L'espace d'un instant, l'assurance coutumière du visage de Marazhai se fissure. Son froncement de sourcils et son regard fuyant trahissent presque... le doute ? Le xénos finit par se détourner en poussant un soupir théâtral.{/n} « Assez parlé. »
languages.original_text: {n}For a brief moment, the mask of self-confidence on Marazhai's face slips. The twitch of his eyebrows and his altered expression almost betray his... doubt? The xenos, however, quickly turns away with an affected sigh.{/n} "Enough talk."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'espace d'un instant, l'assurance coutumière du visage de Marazhai se fissure. Son froncement de sourcils et son regard fuyant trahissent presque... le doute ? Le xénos finit par se détourner en poussant un soupir théâtral.{/n} « Assez parlé. »
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}有那么一瞬间，玛拉斋脸上自信的面具似乎滑落了下来。他抽动着眉毛，表情也发生了变化，几乎已经暴露了他心中的……怀疑？不过，他却做作地叹了口气，迅速转过了身。{/n}“话就说到这里吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}For a brief moment, the mask of self-confidence on Marazhai's face slips. The twitch of his eyebrows and his altered expression almost betray his... doubt? The xenos, however, quickly turns away with an affected sigh.{/n} "Enough talk."

traits.locale_text: {n}有那么一瞬间，玛拉斋脸上自信的面具似乎滑落了下来。他抽动着眉毛，表情也发生了变化，几乎已经暴露了他心中的……怀疑。不过，他却戏剧性地叹了口气，迅速转过了身。{/n}“话就说到这里吧。”
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}一瞬、マラズハイの自信に満ちた仮面が崩れた。眉をピクリと動かし、変化したその表情は…まるで自分の疑念が裏切られたかのようだ。しかし、異種族は大げさなため息をついてすぐに背を向けた。{/n}「話はもういい」
languages.original_text: {n}For a brief moment, the mask of self-confidence on Marazhai's face slips. The twitch of his eyebrows and his altered expression almost betray his... doubt? The xenos, however, quickly turns away with an affected sigh.{/n} "Enough talk."

traits.locale_text: {n}一瞬、マラズハイの自信に満ちた仮面が崩れた。眉をピクリと動かし、変化したその表情は…まるで自分の疑念が裏切られたかのようだ。しかし、異種族は大げさなため息をついてすぐに背を向けた。{/n}「話はもういい」
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}Für einen kurzen Moment verrutscht Marazhais Maske des Selbstvertrauens. Das Zucken mit den Augenbrauen und sein veränderter Blick verraten fast seinen ... Zweifel? Mit einem dramatischen Seufzer wendet sich der Xenos aber ab.{/n} "Genug der Worte."
languages.original_text: {n}For a brief moment, the mask of self-confidence on Marazhai's face slips. The twitch of his eyebrows and his altered expression almost betray his... doubt? The xenos, however, quickly turns away with an affected sigh.{/n} "Enough talk."

traits.locale_text: {n}Für einen kurzen Moment verrutscht Marazhais Maske des Selbstvertrauens. Das Zucken mit den Augenbrauen und sein veränderter Blick verraten fast seinen ... Zweifel? Mit einem dramatischen Seufzer wendet sich der Xenos aber ab.{/n} "Genug der Worte."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}Durante un breve instante se desprende la máscara de confianza del rostro de Marazhai. Una ceja crispada y un cambio en su expresión casi delatan su... ¿duda? Sin embargo, el xenos no tarda en apartar la mirada con un suspiro afectado.{/n} «Basta de cháchara».
languages.original_text: {n}For a brief moment, the mask of self-confidence on Marazhai's face slips. The twitch of his eyebrows and his altered expression almost betray his... doubt? The xenos, however, quickly turns away with an affected sigh.{/n} "Enough talk."

traits.locale_text: {n}Durante un breve instante se desprende la máscara de confianza del rostro de Marazhai. Una ceja crispada y un cambio en su expresión casi delatan su... ¿duda, quizá? Sin embargo, el xenos no tarda en apartar la mirada con un dramático suspiro.{/n} «Basta de cháchara».
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}Kısa bir anlığına Marazhai'ın yüzündeki öz güven maskesi iniyor. Kaşlarındaki seğirti ve farklılaşmış yüz ifadesi seni kendisinden şüphe ettiğini düşünmeye sevk ediyor ki zeno, sahte bir iç çekişle hızlı bir şekilde diğer tarafa dönüyor.{/n} "Bu kadar konuşma yeter."
languages.original_text: {n}For a brief moment, the mask of self-confidence on Marazhai's face slips. The twitch of his eyebrows and his altered expression almost betray his... doubt? The xenos, however, quickly turns away with an affected sigh.{/n} "Enough talk."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kısa bir anlığına Marazhai'ın yüzündeki öz güven maskesi iniyor. Kaşlarındaki seğirme ve farklılaşmış yüz ifadesi nedeniyle neredeyse içinde şüphe olduğunu düşüneceksin ancak zeno sahte bir iç çekişle hızlı bir şekilde diğer tarafa doğru dönüyor.{/n} "Bu kadar konuşma yeter."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai
